ihs.apcs.spacebattle.games

Class BaubleHuntGameInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.BasicGameInfo
      • ihs.apcs.spacebattle.games.BaubleHuntGameInfo

  • public class BaubleHuntGameInfo
extends BasicGameInfo
    Bauble Hunt is a more complex version of the Hungry Hungry Baubles game. Baubles only count towards your score once they have been collected and returned to your Home Base.

    You may store 5 Baubles on your ship at most.

    Blue Bauble are worth 1 point.

    Golden Baubles are worth 3 points.

    Red Baubles are worth 5 points.

    If your ship is destroyed, the Baubles it was carrying will be dropped.

    Since:
    0.9

      • getBaublePositions

        public java.util.List<Point> getBaublePositions()
        Gets a list of positions where there are high-value baubles. Not all bauble positions are returned, but each position in the list has a bauble (unless it has been collected already).
        Returns:
        a list of bauble positions
